GK16dkavy1pu:8: idam andhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam /
GK16dkavy1pu:9: yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotir āsaṃsāraṃ na dīpyate // 1.4 //
GK16dkavy1pu:11: teṣām asaṃnidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati // 1.5 //
GK16dkavy1pu:12: gaur gauḥ kāmadughā samyak prayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:13: duṣprayuktā punar gotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati // 1.6 //
GK16dkavy1pu:14: tad alpam api nopekṣyaṃ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana /
GK16dkavy1pu:15: syād vapuḥ sundaram api śvitreṇaikena durbhagam // 1.7 //
GK16dkavy1pu:20: taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānām alaṃkārāś ca darśitāḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:22: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam /
GK16dkavy1pu:23: padyaṃ catuṣpadī tac ca vṛttaṃ jātir iti dvidhā // 1.11 //
GK16dkavy1pu:25: sā vidyā naus vivikṣūṇāṃ gambhīraṃ kāvyasāgaram // 1.12 //
GK16dkavy1pu:26: muktakaṃ kulakaṃ kośaḥ saṃghāta iti tādṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:29: āśīr namaskriyā vastu- nirdeśo vāpi tanmukham // 1.14 //
GK16dkavy1pu:40: nyūnam apy atra yaiḥkaiścid aṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati /
GK16dkavy1pu:42: guṇataḥ prāg upanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām /
GK16dkavy1pu:45: tajjayān nāyakotkarṣa- varṇanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ // 1.22 //
GK16dkavy1pu:47: iti tasya prabhedau dvau tayor ākhyāyikā kila // 1.23 //
GK16dkavy1pu:50: api tv aniyamo dṛṣṭas tatrāpy anyair udīraṇāt /
GK16dkavy1pu:51: anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛg vā bhedalakṣaṇam // 1.25 //
GK16dkavy1pu:52: vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca socchvāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam /
GK16dkavy1pu:53: cihnam ākhyāyikāyāś cet prasaṅgena kathāsv api // 1.26 //
GK16dkavy1pu:55: bhedaś ca dṛṣṭo lambādir ucchvāso vāstu kiṃ tataḥ // 1.27 //
GK16dkavy1pu:61: mukham iṣṭārthasaṃsiddhyai kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām // 1.30 //
GK16dkavy1pu:64: tad etad vāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā /
GK16dkavy1pu:65: apabhraṃśaś ca miśraṃ cety āhur āryāś caturvidham // 1.32 //
GK16dkavy1pu:66: saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāg anvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:70: śaurasenī ca gauḍī ca lāṭī cānyā ca tādṛśī /
GK16dkavy1pu:71: yāti prākṛtam ity evaṃ vyavahāreṣu saṃnidhim // 1.35 //
GK16dkavy1pu:79: śravyam eveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatir udāhṛtā // 1.39 //
GK16dkavy1pu:80: asty aneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam /
GK16dkavy1pu:84: iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:106: madhuraṃ rasavad vāci vastuny api rasasthitiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:110: yayā kayācic chrutyā yat samānam anubhūyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:112: eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ prāptavān brahmaṇapriyaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:114: itīdaṃ nādṛtaṃ gauḍair anuprāsas tu tatpriyaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:115: anuprāsād api prāyo vaidarbhair idam iṣyate // 1.54 //
GK16dkavy1pu:116: varṇāvṛttir anuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca /
GK16dkavy1pu:120: cāru candramasaṃ bhīru bimbaṃ paśyaitad ambare /
GK16dkavy1pu:123: na tu rāmāmukhāmbhoja- sadṛśaś candramā iti // 1.58 //
GK16dkavy1pu:124: smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaś ca naḥ kṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:125: cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ // 1.59 //
GK16dkavy1pu:126: ity ādi bandhapāruṣyaṃ śaithilyaṃ ca nigacchati /
GK16dkavy1pu:130: tat tu naikāntamadhuram ataḥ paścād vidhāsyate // 1.61 //
GK16dkavy1pu:133: kāmaṃ sarvo 'py alaṃkāro rasam arthe niṣañcati /
GK16dkavy1pu:135: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham /
GK16dkavy1pu:142: duṣpratītikaraṃ grāmyaṃ yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā // 1.66 //
GK16dkavy1pu:143: kharaṃ prahṛtya viśrāntaḥ puruṣo vīryavān iti /
GK16dkavy1pu:144: evam ādi na śaṃsanti mārgayor ubhayor api // 1.67 //
GK16dkavy1pu:154: dīptam ity aparair bhūmnā kṛcchrodyam api badhyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:155: nyakṣeṇa kṣayitaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇād iti // 1.72 //
GK16dkavy1pu:161: nedṛśaṃ bahu manyate mārgayor ubhayor api /
GK16dkavy1pu:164: utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaścid yasminn ukte pratīyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:166: arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt /
GK16dkavy1pu:167: tadavasthā punar deva nānyasya mukham īkṣate // 1.77 //
GK16dkavy1pu:168: iti tyāgasya vākye 'sminn utkarṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:170: ślāghyair viśeṣaṇair yuktam udāraṃ kaiścid iṣyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:179: iti padye 'pi paurastyā badhnanty ojasvinīr giraḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:180: anye tv anākulaṃ hṛdyam icchanty ojo girāṃ yathā // 1.83 //
GK16dkavy1pu:182: kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati // 1.84 //
GK16dkavy1pu:185: tac ca vārttābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsv api dṛśyate // 1.85 //
GK16dkavy1pu:186: gṛhāṇi nāma tāny eva taporāśir bhavādṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:193: yo 'rthas tenāti tuṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ // 1.89 //
GK16dkavy1pu:198: idam atyuktir ity uktam etad gauḍopalālitam /
GK16dkavy1pu:199: prasthānaṃ prākpraṇītaṃ tu sāram anyasya vartmanaḥ // 1.92 //
GK16dkavy1pu:202: samyag ādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā // 1.93 //
GK16dkavy1pu:209: iti hṛdyam ahṛdyaṃ tu niḥṣṭhīvati vadhūr iti /
GK16dkavy1pu:210: yugapan naikadharmāṇām adhyāsaś ca smṛto yathā // 1.97 //
GK16dkavy1pu:215: tad etat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhir nāma yo guṇaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:218: tadbhedās tu na śakyante vaktuṃ pratikavi sthitāḥ // 1.101 //
GK16dkavy1pu:220: tathāpi na tad ākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate // 1.102 //
GK16dkavy1pu:221: naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahu nirmalam /
GK16dkavy1pu:223: na vidyate yady api pūrvavāsanā- guṇānubandhi pratibhānam adbhutam /
GK16dkavy1pu:224: śrutena yatnena ca vāg upāsitā dhruvaṃ karoty eva kamapy anugraham // 1.104 //
GK16dkavy1pu:225: tad astatandrair aniśaṃ sarasvatī śramād upāsyā khalu kīrtim īpsubhiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:226: kṛśe kavitve 'pi janāḥ kṛtaśramāḥ vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartum īśate // 1.105 //
GK16dkavy1pu:227: // iti kāvyādarśe mārgavibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
